languages.text: Приказал{mf||а} разрушить еретический алтарь, невзирая на сопутствующие жертвы.
Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.
languages.original_text: Приказал{mf||а} разрушить еретический алтарь, невзирая на сопутствующие жертвы.

traits.locale_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

languages.text: 你下令摧毁邪恶祭坛，完全不在意可能会造成的伤亡。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: 你下令摧毁邪恶祭坛，完全不在意可能会造成的伤亡。

languages.text: 異端の祭壇は、犠牲者が出ようとも破壊せよと命じた。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: 異端の祭壇は、犠牲者が出ようとも破壊せよと命じた。

languages.text: Has ordenado la destrucción del altar herético, cueste lo que cueste.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: Has ordenado la destrucción del altar herético, cueste lo que cueste.

languages.text: Befohlen, dass der ketzerische Altar zerstört wird, ungeachtet der Todesopfer.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: Befohlen, dass der ketzerische Altar zerstört wird, ungeachtet der Todesopfer.

languages.text: Zayiata bakılmaksızın kâfir sunaklarının yok edilmesini emrettin.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: Zayiata bakılmaksızın kâfir sunaklarının yok edilmesini emrettin.

languages.text: Vous avez ordonné la destruction de l'autel hérétique, et ce, au mépris des victimes collatérales.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the heretical altar be destroyed, regardless of the casualties.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez ordonné la destruction de l'autel hérétique, et ce, au mépris des victimes collatérales.
